video.title: The Almighty Johnsons
video.synopsis: Inside each of the Johnson brothers beats the heart of a Norse god. But they can't fulfill their destinies until brother Axl finds his soul mate.

episodes.synopsis: It's Axl Johnson's 21st birthday -- which explains the fire in the sky and the various women who seem to want to kill him.
episodes.title: It's Kind of A Birthday Present

episodes.synopsis: Axl learns that he must reunite with Odin's wife, Frigg, or his family will be in danger.
episodes.title: This Is Where Duty Starts

episodes.synopsis: One of the things about Goddesses is that they can show up anywhere -- be it in a library or at a bar.
episodes.title: God's Gift To Zebras

episodes.synopsis: When Olaf's ex-girlfriend shows up pregnant, Axl tries to arrange things so Mike and Val can adopt the baby.
episodes.title: You Gotta Love Life, Babe

episodes.synopsis: Michele tries to frame Axl by planting cocaine in his car, and he must prove his innocence to the police.
episodes.title: This Is Not Washing Powder, My Friend

episodes.synopsis: A road trip to follow a falling star takes the God boys into uncharted territory, to a heartland of darkness where the usual rules no longer apply.
episodes.title: Goddesses, Axl, Come in All Forms

episodes.synopsis: Two nights out drinking lead to two different forms of temptation -- both of which could end very badly for the parties concerned.
episodes.title: Bad Things Happen

episodes.synopsis: The arrival of a singing butcher causes a shift in celestial power as the Gods and Goddesses work to get on the right side of the equation.
episodes.title: I Can Give You Frigg

episodes.synopsis: Axl and Eva begin a relationship and quickly get engaged, while Ty realizes he can't be with the mortal Dawn.
episodes.title: Hunting Reindeer on Slippery Rocks

episodes.synopsis: The time has finally come for Axl Johnson and his brothers to man up and be the Gods they truly are.
episodes.title: Every Good Quest Has a Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: Mike has taken over Gaia's old room at Axl and Zeb's place. Meanwhile, Ty is preoccupied with his own dysfunctional marriage.
episodes.title: And Then She Will Come To You

episodes.synopsis: Agnetha is still trying to win the boys over to her side and takes Ty and Axl out to dinner, but Ty gets 'detained' by Eva and doesn't show.
episodes.title: Frigg Magnet

episodes.synopsis: Ty's downward spiral picks up pace; Gaia hooks up with a stranger at a party.
episodes.title: Charlie Truman

episodes.synopsis: Agnetha admits that she killed Eva -- but what is Ty going to do about it?
episodes.title: Death's Cleansing Embrace

episodes.synopsis: There are new women in the lives of both Axl and Ty -- but are they here to stay?
episodes.title: A Damn Fine Woman

episodes.synopsis: As Ty sleeps soundly, Colin walks around him speaking in Old Norse. By the time his work is done, Ty is surrounded by walls of fire.
episodes.title: Folkmoot

episodes.synopsis: Axl's good nature is being taken advantage of as Ty palms Ingrid off on him.
episodes.title: Effortless Manly Coolness

episodes.synopsis: After the Johnson clan becomes infected with a virus, Axl slips into a coma.
episodes.title: Man-Flu

episodes.synopsis: Axl wakes to find Gaia shifting furniture in response to a dream she had about the perfect furniture arrangement for the flat.
episodes.title: Everything Starts With Gaia

episodes.synopsis: Gaia is still not getting her head around the idea that she is Frigg -- in fact, she's openly mocking Axl and Bryn.
episodes.title: Magical Fluffy Bunny World

episodes.synopsis: As Axl deals with dueling prophecies, a cold wind sweeps in from the North, leading to a marriage Anders never saw coming.
episodes.title: The House of Jerome

episodes.synopsis: Axl and Gaia's escape from the real world takes a turn for the surreal, while Mike discovers his world is not his alone.
episodes.title: You Call This the Real World?

episodes.synopsis: It's the day of Gaia's 21st birthday. Will she become Frigg, or is Papatuanuku her destiny?
episodes.title: Does This Look Like Asgard?

episodes.synopsis: Axl and Gaia deal with the events of the ceremony by trying to forget what happened. Meanwhile, the rest of the Johnsons have some cleaning up to do.
episodes.title: An Orchard of Trees

episodes.synopsis: Gaia refuses to confess what she did the previous night, and suggests that she and Axl wed sooner than they had planned.
episodes.title: This Thing Inside

episodes.synopsis: Axl tries his hand at binge drinking, Ty experiences a life-changing catastrophe, and Mike changes teams -- all for the good of the family.
episodes.title: Bergerbar

episodes.synopsis: Mike and Michele have no choice but to move into Michele's house -- with her mom. Meanwhile, Anders finds a briefcase full of money.
episodes.title: Like the Berserkers of Old

episodes.synopsis: An awkward and unexpected family reunion occurs in Michele's kitchen when Mike finally comes face-to-face with his father.
episodes.title: Unleash the Kraken!

episodes.synopsis: While Axl's road trip to Norsewood with Joe takes a couple of unexpected turns, Mike and Michele take their own roads to the dark side.
episodes.title: And Then On to Norsewood

episodes.synopsis: After an evening involving lots of beer, Axl wakes up in bed with a gorgeous barmaid and Derrick discovers that he has lost Thor's hammer.
episodes.title: Typical Auckland God

episodes.synopsis: The mayoral campaign is in full swing, with Dawn front and center. Anders tries to interfere when Colin demands that Dawn accompany him to a function.
episodes.title: The Asparagus Is Kicking In

episodes.synopsis: Zeb dreams up a scheme to open a casting call for a fictional beer commercial to lure out the real Frigg. Axl is fired up about this genius idea.
episodes.title: Mike in the Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Axl considers the possibility of using the Yggdrasil to assist in finding Frigg. Ty and Dawn start to second-guess their happy romance.
episodes.title: Playing God

episodes.synopsis: Mike is tracking Frigg by scent in a race to get to her before Axl, but there are countless setbacks in his path -- one of which is named Michele.
episodes.title: A Bit Like Buses Really

episodes.synopsis: With Axl and Mike both claiming to be Odin, Hanna refuses to rush into deciding who is the rightful one. But neither brother is willing to wait.
episodes.title: Late to the Point of Knowledge

episodes.synopsis: The Johnsons come to grips with the news that they may soon be living as mere mortals. Hanna is sending clear signals that she has chosen her Odin.
episodes.title: The End of the World As We Know It
